name: PonyURL
tag_list: url, shorten, service, shorturl, url-shortening-service, tiny, web, address, small
overview:
PonyURL allows users to shorten those pesky long URLs into much shorter ones. You can use PonyURL to shorten web addresses for emails, forum posts, blogs and much more! The best thing about PonyURL is that it is 100% free of charge.

PonyURL has combined the most sophisticated modern web technologies together and has adopted and integrated the legendary Japanese philosophy and algorithm into the site’s design concept.

PonyURL was built by an international team of young entrepreneurs who were frustrated when they had to enter long URL’s in instant messaging services, then one bright spark decided to build an online platform where people can condense the long pesky URL’s into short snappy ones.
